name: OR_OPE_CODE_DIAGNOSIS
description: This table contains the diagnoses associated with procedure codes.

columns.name: OPE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the orders performed record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the procedure code.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the diagnosis associated with the procedure code.

columns.name: PROC_CODE_DX_ID
columns.description: The unique diagnosis identifier associated with the code.
